cli.no_time_remaining: No time remaining for a user response.
cli.answer_time_minutes: You have {minutes} minutes ({seconds} seconds) to answer. Press Enter to skip.
cli.answer_time_seconds: You have {seconds} seconds to answer. Press Enter to skip.
cli.no_response: No response received within the allotted time.
cli.case_not_found_create: Case not found for {case_id}, creating a new case.
cli.ignore_case_id: Ignoring --case-id because this is not Slovak advice mode.
orchestrator.no_response_minutes: User could not answer within {minutes} minutes.
orchestrator.no_response_seconds: User could not answer within {seconds} seconds.
orchestrator.followup_prompt: Do you have any other questions? Type 'finish' to end.
orchestrator.judge_review_prompt: Do you want the judge to review this advice? (yes/no)
orchestrator.recommendation_default: Recommendation: Proceed with the user's requested position, but address the judge's clarifying question and emphasize the strongest facts.
